category: news
title: "Zoom enterprise growth tapers as it pushes AI services"
excerpt: "Zoom’s growth rate for enterprise revenue is slowing in an environment where customers are prioritizing software service bundles. While Zoom’s enterprise revenue is still growing, up 10% year-over-year in Q2 FY 2024 earnings reported Monday, it posted enterprise revenue growth of 27% in the same quarter of last year."
